I've been introduced to this game through a friend of my. I first played it on a free weekend to try it out, that was a couple years ago. I decided to buy it on sale with some DLC's from movie franchises that I like. I had much fun during my play time, even tho I am not the best at the game. I met new friends by playing and also had a really great time with them playing. (And I still have a okay time playing with everyone I played with). Now, recently and a bit before, I play it much less then before. One reason of it, is the new ranking system. For what I see, it makes the game more competitive and not so much casual anymore then it was before.
Overall, I still recommend this game because you can still have fun (in my opinion), and have a great time. I need to say it tho, the players can be toxic sometimes.

I fondly remember playing this game while in my youth; the essence of slasher films formulated into this dark mass of gore and brutal slayings has made me almost nostalgic. As being a fan of horror, the concept of this game overall has a nice ring to it.

O descaso dessa empresa com o jogador é bizarra. Continuam lançando expansões e skins, mas o mínimo que é otimizar o jogo, tirar os bugs, e melhorar as mecânicas dentro do jogo, eles não fazem. Sinceramente, a pior experiência que eu já tive num jogo online na vida. Se vocês quiserem ter um AVC com 20 anos de idade, esse jogo é para vocês, caso contrário, recomendo candy crush que acreditem, é bem melhor
DBDに対して人々の愛がなかったら、こんなバグが多いゲームはとっくにサービス終了になっています。それほど大勢の人々が愛している証拠です。

Screw this stupid ass game. It was so much more bearable to get baby survivors or getting bully squads as a killer than this shit. I can barely even touch or look at this game at this point. Games don't last even 5 minutes at this point. You sit in queue almost twice as long sometimes. The utter toxicity and BHVR's total lack of doing anything about it. It's almost just as bad as the toxicity on League of Legends, and that's something you don't want to live up to there. It's always the same monotonous 4 perks and on both survivor and killer. No one plays Killer for this reason due to the lack of control they can have over this. Killer queues have become instant and Survivor queues take 10 damn years. I have to play Killer basically if I even want to play the damn game if it's just me. All the killers really do are camp and tunnel now because MMR is based solely off if you get kills or escape. Their Emblem system is rendered useless in that sense. The grind is way too big for how many characters are in the game. Took me until almost 600 hours just to get all the perks on survivor side and even longer onto just one character. There really isn't enough damn time for me to list every little fucking problem with this game and the company itself. The fact their own developers play in such toxic and unfun ways on both sides says a lot.

My opinions of this game change like the balance in each patch, so I'll try to keep this broad. If I had maybe 40-50 hours, I would probably recommend against buying this game. If you hate microtranscations and continuous spending, I would recommend against it too. The thing is- despite all of the issues within the devs and the community, you'll find that the vast majority of serious reviewers have over 100-200 hours, easily reaching into the thousands. 

Why?

No one really knows. It's addicting, unique, and sometimes even fun, and the money I've spent on this game could've been used to buy ten other fantastic and fun games with none of the enraging, sloppy and downright scummy elements that Dead by Daylight has. 

So buy it, but don't play it in a vacuum. Look up guides and gameplay and funny moments from the community, try and get a tutor or some fellow newbie friends from the official discord, and try to immerse yourself in what makes DBD a game people keep coming back to despite /everything/- at least within the two hours before your refund window closes. 

Good luck out there in the fog!

Um jogo incrível, principalmente se você joga com amigos. Recebe conteúdo novo com frequência, então você vai voltar sempre ao jogo. O maior problema é se você joga de assassino. Se você é um jogador casual, que não se dedica tanto a aprender a mecânica dos mapas e do seu personagem, o jogo se torna muito punitivo. Um simples erro pode transformar um partida ganha em uma derrota humilhante.

Gra jest fajna, ale sporo cheaterów.

Como cualquier juego online: lleno de altibajos. Te insertás y mimetizás con el personaje, su historia y te empezás a armar builds contra un asesino o asesina que busca matarte. Hasta que en la quinta partida te cansás de que te tuneleen y terminás rompiendo algo.
Es divertido jugar con amigos y sus distintas intensidades: los que la viven, los que juegan casual y los que... no entienden nada. Todos conviviendo en una sala. Siendo un asesino o asesina, la cosa se torna un poco más personal con cada sobreviviente y su linterna tiqui tiqui, y ahí te volvés lo que siempre juraste destruir: un tunelero tóxico. Pero siempre volvés a recapacitar y querer jugar y disfrutar luego de un largo día. Y el ciclo se vuelve a repetir.
De todas maneras, alto juegazo. Lo banco y súper recomiendo NO COMPRAR- mentira. Cómprenlo. :)
